sourcesContent: "use strict";Object.defineProperty(exports,"__esModule",{value:!0});var r=require("../../utility/number/index.js"),n=require("../../utility/number/number.js"),t=function(){for(var t=arguments.length,e=new Array(t),a=0;a<t;a++)e[a]=arguments[a];return function(t){return n.map.apply(r,[t].concat(e))}};exports.angle=function(r){var e=r.center,a=e.x,u=e.y,o=r.angle,c=o.from,i=o.range,l=r.output,p=l.min,f=l.max;return function(r){var e=r.left,o=r.top,l=e-a,m=o-u,s=(Math.atan(m/l)+(l<0?Math.PI:0)+Math.PI/2)*(180/Math.PI);return(s=s-c+(s>=0&&s<c?360:0))>180+i/2&&(s=0),t(0,i,p,f)(n.clamp(s,0,i))}},exports.clamp=function(){for(var t=arguments.length,e=new Array(t),a=0;a<t;a++)e[a]=arguments[a];return function(t){return n.clamp.apply(r,[t].concat(e))}},exports.decimals=function(){for(var t=arguments.length,e=new Array(t),a=0;a<t;a++)e[a]=arguments[a];return function(t){return n.decimals.apply(r,[t].concat(e))}},exports.interval=function(){for(var t=arguments.length,e=new Array(t),a=0;a<t;a++)e[a]=arguments[a];return function(t){return n.interval.apply(r,[t].concat(e))}},exports.map=t;
